name: In Memoriam (sirbee)
description: Unravel the tangled memories of a man nearing the end of his unnaturally long life in this short interactive fiction. In Memoriam, a quiet reflection on an expansive life, has the reader navigating the complicated web of Ambrose, a man who is at once a priest, a soldier, a husband, a father, a frightened child -- and even a killer. Help him find peace and clarity, here at the end of his inexplicable immortality.
